abstract: Carl Icahn, the billionaire investor, is leading a group that has submitted a $200 million bid for the Tropicana Casino and Resort in Atlantic City.
lead_paragraph: Carl Icahn, the billionaire investor, is leading a group that has submitted a $200 million bid for the Tropicana Casino and Resort in Atlantic City.

headline.main: Icahn-Led Group Bids for Tropicana Casino
